 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹחַ‎</span> **noun masculine** ==marrow== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺחַ‎</span>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מוֺחָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> all ***marrow, brain***); — only construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹחַ עַצְמוֺתָיו יְשֻׁקֶּה‎</span> [[Job.21.24|Job 21:24]] figurative of prosperity.
